A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I LOVED this movie! I’m not sure what “all of the hate” and low ratings are about\, but I enjoyed this movie more than any of the others. There’s great action\, great comedy\, and cool effects. What more can you ask for? I hope that people go to see this movie for themselves instead of overreacting to “Disney Haters” because this movie was actually very well written and produced.
